snippet: “Don’t let others tell you who you are,” says Charlotte Beers, former chairwoman and C.E.O. of Ogilvy & Mather Worldwide. Self-assessments, she says, are vital.
abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office column features interview with Ogilvy & Mather's former chairwoman and chief executive officer Charlotte Beers discussing her management style.
lead_paragraph: “Don’t let others tell you who you are,” says Charlotte Beers, former chairwoman and C.E.O. of Ogilvy & Mather Worldwide. Self-assessments, she says, are vital.

headline.print_headline: The Best Scorecard Is the One You Keep for Yourself
headline.seo: Charlotte Beers, on the Importance of Self-Assessment
headline.main: The Best Scorecard Is the One You Keep for Yourself
